text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://connect.ichom.org/patient-centered-outcome-measures/stroke/SmokingStatus
    CodeDisplay
    0Current every day smoker (a person who smokes daily).
    1Current weekly smoker (a person who smokes at least weekly but not daily).
    2Former smoker (a person who does not smoke at all now, but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes or a similar amount of other tobacco products in his/her lifetime).
    3Never smoker.
    4Others.
    999Unknown if ever smoked.

name: MolicAVC_SmokingStatusValueSet
title: ValueSet of Smoking Status
description: ValueSet for Smoking Status. A person's current and past smoking behavior.

concept.display: Current every day smoker (a person who smokes daily).
Current weekly smoker (a person who smokes at least weekly but not daily).
Former smoker (a person who does not smoke at all now, but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes or a similar amount of other tobacco products in his/her lifetime).
